0x00400000  0x3c011001  lui $1,0x00001001     5    	la $t0, dado
0x00400004  0x34280000  ori $8,$1,0x00000000       
0x00400008  0x8d090000  lw $9,0x00000000($8)  6    	lw $t1, 0($t0)
0x0040000c  0x212a000a  addi $10,$9,0x0000000a7    	addi $t2, $t1, 10
0x00400010  0xad0a0000  sw $10,0x00000000($8) 8    	sw $t2, 0($t0)
